code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{FetchMealById}from"../../services/mealtService";import SearchBox from'../../components/SearchBox/index';import"./index.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DetailMeal=()=>{const{idMeal}=useParams();const[meal,setMeal]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{const data=await FetchMealById(idMeal);setMeal(data);};fetchData();},[idMeal]);if(!meal)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Cargando..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"meal-detail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchBox,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:meal.strMeal}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:meal.strMealThumb,alt:meal.strMeal}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:meal.strInstructions})]})]});};export default DetailMeal;
